-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 5 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) WITH(Zone VARCHAR(200)) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 5 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) WITH(Zone VARCHAR(200)) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 5 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )  AS [result]



SELECT
    TOP 5 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH(Zone VARCHAR(200)) AS [result]

exec sp_describe_fir

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT ,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) ,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 
    )AS [result]'






SELECT
    max(len(LocationID)),max(len(Borough)),max(len(Zone)) ,max(len(service_zone))
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

--COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8


SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH ( LocationID INT  
            , Borough VARCHAR(20) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8
            , Zone VARCHAR(50)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8
            , service_zone VARCHAR(20)  COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8
            ) AS [result]




SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH ( LocationID INT  
            , Borough VARCHAR(20) 
            , Zone VARCHAR(50)  
            , service_zone VARCHAR(20)
            ) AS [result]


select collation_name,name, * from sys.databases

ALTER DATABASE Mmaster collate   

--taxi_zone_without_header.csv



SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = FALSE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH ( LocationID INT  
            , Borough VARCHAR(20) 
            , Zone VARCHAR(50)  
            , service_zone VARCHAR(20)
            ) AS [result]



SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = FALSE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (  Borough VARCHAR(20) 2
            , service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4
            ) AS [result]



SELECT
    Borough
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = FALSE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (  Borough VARCHAR(20) 2
            , service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4
            ) AS [result]



SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        --HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH ( location_id INT   1
            , borough VARCHAR(20)  2
            , zone VARCHAR(50)  3
            , service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4
            ) AS [result]



SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        --FIRSTROW = 2,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (trip_type TINYINT , trip_type_desc VARCHAR(20)) AS [result]



    -- Querying Spark DB tables using Serverless SQL Pool 
    select * from nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.dbo.trip_data_green_agg;
